name: Unbeatable Snake
description:
Gameplay

Unbeatable Snake is a super fun but really challenging retro snake game. Complete each level by collecting all of the apples. As you progress through each level, you'll find increasing difficulty presented in different ways. More apples, of course, and as a result, a longer snake to manage. Also, levels have a variety of obstacles which are intended to provide unique challenges.

Why Snake?

I wanted to go back to my game dev roots, where I was building snake-like games on the Apple IIe with it's blocky large pixel resolution layout. This game is exactly the kind of thing I would have built back then, and I hope you enjoy it.

Credits

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: 1984 by Frank Schroeter

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/7742-1984
